website_summaries.verdict: Protect your console while taking your gaming with you wherever you go.
pros: This case doubles as a gaming center with its 19-inch built-in display that connects to your console for gaming anywhere
Compatible with recent PlayStation and Xbox systems, this case holds your console securely in place and includes storage for cables and controllers
cons: The screen is not of the best quality and can be fragile
There are many less expensive cases without built-in screens

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this system for exactly 97 days and a pixel in the center of the screen just died (it constantly glows red, so it's very distracting). In an attempt to return the unit for a replacement I've found the warranty period is only 90 days so I'm stuck with it. Obviously Gaems knows these screens are low quality and realize the likelihood of something going wrong because I've never heard of a manufacturer having a warranty period of less than one year and 90 days is just ridiculous. The screen also has poor contrast and it's hard to find an angle where the display does the games any justice. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MannyG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen for gaming on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I owned an older GAEMS box, and this one is everything that one should have been, and more. MUCH MUCH improved screen, and seemingly better sound. If you want to travel with your PS4, XBOX, or anything else for that matter, this is the luxury way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Musacchio

customer_reviews.title: Works with PS4 pro but has to turn it sideways. (See pic)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. My advice is to turn down the sharpness. Will help the image quality quite a bit. Still folks it's 720p.. NOT 1080 or 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: It likes that order best. This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to turn the tv on first, then the system. It likes that order best. This is awesome, especially as far as portability goes. TV resolution is very good. I have run this for 8-10 hours at a time and it does fine. I also use a drying mat for dishes (the microfiber one) to protect the tv from scratches. I put my discs in thin packs on top of the gaming system and the drying mat makes sure they don't scratch the tv when the system is being moved from location to location.
customer_reviews.author: Ichino

customer_reviews.title: Seems like listing the compatibility but not covering that aspect is ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the system for my XBOX ONE which it lists as compatible. When you open the package it has labels that tell you that you need other material to properly mount the system but at no time during the ordering does it tell you if the kit is shipping separately. I see in the customer questions that someone contacted GAEMS via e-mail and got tracking for the kit; however, the Amazon site does not list the e-mail for GAEMS. Seems like listing the compatibility but not covering that aspect is a shortfall. Other than that the system seems good so far. Not the highest quality but fits for the price.
customer_reviews.author: FA CPT

customer_reviews.title: Protect your screen (keep the foam scree.
customer_reviews.text: Its dope, the screen is clear and it made it too Afghanistan. I put my soft hoodie in between the screen and xbox. Cause I know soldiers will toss our bags into every aircraft like garbage. But man this is worth it for reals. The screen did come with a tiny green dot on the screen but I could care less. It get here in 1 piece and it works.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Nice but sucky quality! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Work great for two months the screen has lines. Only moved it from room to room. Customer service said I broke the screen. Hmmmm what’s the purpose of a portable system if it breaks in transport. Customer service through osmosis said I had something that crack the screen. I wish this was a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Rayvon’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Screen issues
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this for a month and we are experiencing problems with the screen. There are lines in the screen when it’s on and playing. They do not go away , we plan on returning it in hopes of getting another one. Kids like it but I’m not to confident in it’s durability or quality...
customer_reviews.author: burney

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect just don’t mess it up like me!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great totally worth it I may have fick up my screen and I am truly sadden by it since I’m going on deployment with a screen that the colors are mess up by as long as you follow the instructions when packing it and don’t let anyone drop it while your Xbox 1 is in it since it’s a tight a tight fit everything will be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son. While not perfect, he only used twice and by day 2, there were vertical stripes down the front the screen and we were unable to view it. Amazon made it easy to return and repurchase. Hoping it was just a freak thing as it has some really great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: keleigh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool how easily you can move back and forth ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Pretty cool how easily you can move back and forth from place to place. Literally timed myself, takes 2 min. 30 sec. to pack up and set up. Price is understandable based on quality. Not a geek, don't care about specs. just care about whether or not I can plug in and play. No issues so far with the screen, speakers, or ventilation of my PS4. Response time is nice. I can ask my boi's "where we landing" in Fortnite with ease. Also when I unpacked it came with a foam screen cover and I was gonna throw it away, but I figured why not just keep it as extra protection for the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and the first time he put it together to play his xbox the screen had lines all throughout it. Very disappointed and customer service is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Christen Christensen

customer_reviews.title: bad screen build
customer_reviews.text: I,ve not owned this a year and from just being in my truck traveling the screen has broken if it cant handle vibration it is not portable !
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Lee

customer_reviews.title: GAEMS Vanguard PGE is the perfect mobile gaming experience!
customer_reviews.text: GAEMS Vanguard PGE is perfect for mobile gaming. I am in the military and I ordered this product because I was deploying overseas. It's easy to set up and break down. I recommend buying the double outlet cord. Perfect size screen for getting the best gaming experience. It's also great for traveling when you're staying at a hotel or somewhere with a power source. The only downfall is the clamps on the side that close the case. Mine is still in tact but I've heard of people accidentally breaking theirs so handle it with care. 10/10 satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this gaming environment because the screen inside is too small to enjoy the quality of the games I play.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible latches!
customer_reviews.text: The product works as it should. It has one major design flaw...the latches break very easily. We bought this for our adult son for Christmas (1 month ago) and he says the cheap plastic latches have already broken. Spend the extra couple of bucks and put on the metal latches, for goodness sakes. Ridiculous. Other than that, excellent solution for gamers on-the-go. I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Bought new & screen was majorly cracked
customer_reviews.text: You'd think that a product designed to be a hard shell protective device, would be tough. The first tip off was that one of the carrying cases was missing a locking device. No big deal, I was going to live with, because it's not a big deal to me, but when it was missing the short HDMI connector, I started to get suspicious. Then once I booted up the monitor, I discovered half of the screen was cracked. Not sure if it happened during delivery, or if it was not tested, but this was suppose to be a new device. Probably just gonna buy it directly from the producer next time, since I'm nervous about trusting this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: FroeyTee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE FOR XBOX ONE
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good item to have, however it doesn't fit the Xbox one well the Xbox does fit but you can't have the wires or controllers in the box which isn't said anywhere on the product page. In my photos you can see that the screen is decent and all but there is zero room for the wires with a Xbox when the box is open let alone shut. Pretty disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: D. Towns

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product if you work on the road like I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you work on the road like I do. I love this. I don't have a internet connection where I work. But, it allows me to catch up on the backlog of single player games I haven't even touched. Get you a good hotspot or wifi connection, it's just like being at home. GREAT PRODUCT. Highly recommended for any gamer on the go
customer_reviews.author: Austin Van Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV. Used it at a hotel. Nice colors, easy to set up, Thought to remote looked kind of like a auto cd player remote, but I understand the whole point is to have a mobile console. Also use it on my desktop PC, and for a second screen when I want to watch more than one football game.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Wagner

customer_reviews.title: UGHH unsure how i got a 2inch dead pixel line
customer_reviews.text: this thing did me no wrong, and I kept it in the box when not in use until 1 day I took it out and found the screen with a 2inch going half way across the screen dead. not an easy find to replace the screen :((
customer_reviews.author: bandy_gamer

customer_reviews.title: Case Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: In my 5 months of owning this product the TV inside the case has worked great but the suitcase itself is fragile. It is made of cheap plastic and has broke on me in several different places. One of the latches has snapped off, and one of the rings holding the strap has completely snapped off as well due to the wight of my Xbox One. A console in which the product states that it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Nikk

customer_reviews.title: Gamers Dream
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! Took it with me on vacation and it worked great. Used it for my PS4 and enjoyed every minute. Nice size screen, sound is great...had two earphone jacks for quite time lol. Just what I hoped it would be. Only con is that with the PS4, the screen might start changing different colors if the tv is shutdown and not the system (like placing the PS4 in standby)..something with the way the connection is received by the PS4..but this doesn't happen during game play. So it's not a big deal. Just turn off the tv and the station and restart them both and you will be up and running. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Freakin love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it to play my PS4 when not at home, it literally goes everywhere with me. So far I have not had any problems with the Personal Gaming Environment. If you are careful you can fit everything plus 2 controllers for a PS4. I play a lot of Mass Effect, Fallout 4 and No Man's Sky, all play very well on the system
customer_reviews.author: amanda barker

customer_reviews.title: I am loving it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my product I ask them to double the packaging just to be on safe side cause packages get damaged easily an I didn't wanted to take any chances an it my Christmas gift from my boo boo I hook it up an I am very impressed of the overall presentation I am enjoying very very much thank you I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: hayato

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hardware
customer_reviews.text: A great pice of hardware to take everywhere you go and not get bored.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling, vacations, bathroom breaks, work
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t remember what the 1080p version was called so I typed in Gaems and this came up. I was waaaay too lazy to type out Sentinel or Sentry whatever or even look under the little related items section so I settled on this one. It’s awesome though. I tested this out in my throne room aka the bathroom. It was rad. The end.
customer_reviews.author: MushaAleste

customer_reviews.title: Great device and perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! It's a great unit to have for the price. I have used this to take my PS4 to work and play during down time. The screen looks great and it's very portable. Make sure you buy a cable that let's you plug two power cables into one, basically a Y cable for power. You can lock the case which I highly recommend buying two small luggage style locks for it so you can keep it closed for sure. 5 stars, I don't know what I'd do without my GAEMS!
customer_reviews.author: DJ GodsOwn

customer_reviews.title: The screen went out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few months ago but only used it for one vacation for my son. I carried it most of the time, so it was in great hands. I just went to use it again and now the screen has lines in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken two times. - -The Replacement was just as bad as the initial purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This produce was given to an adult, not a child. After gentle use - maybe 20x the screen blew. Basically you have a portable screen and that is it. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rachelsconzo

customer_reviews.title: Plug n play gaming
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this item but it’s beyond expected audio n video r great use it anywhere u can find a standard power outlet just 2 minor issues (for Consoles with the hdmi plug in on the rear left side) the hdmi connector is short it will connect console to screen but bends one side at a sharp angle n the carrying case takes a little bit to open otherwise its perfect 4 on the go gaming
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved and working.
customer_reviews.text: Still working after 6 months. Way brighter and LOUDER than I expected. Good quality TV case. Do not store controllers in case if carrying.
customer_reviews.author: AL SERRETTE

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea product
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, I always think about how to bring my PS3 out to a hotel or restaurant to play. This product has a smart idea that allows me to take it out and keep my playing. It included a monitor, speaker. However, it just a little too heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Z&Z

customer_reviews.title: This setup is amazing! The sound is extremely loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: This setup is amazing! The sound is extremely loud and clear, the picture is great, it even has enough room to fit the play station 4 with the tower expandable hard drive. The case is really strong and easy to carry. It weighs a little bit but not too much. It has enough room to fit 2 controllers and the power cords in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the traveling gamer.
customer_reviews.text: The screen display is great for Xbox one use. The One fits very snug in the Vanguard. I received a pad but it only makes it harder to put in, so I believe they sent me the wrong one. Will Be emailing them about that one. My only gripe is that there is almost no protection for the screen. Why not put a very small strip of foam around it? To pad it. I'm going to end up doing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: I travel in an RV a lot and am so happy to find this product. It makes setting up and shutting down so easy, and actually provides it's on storage case. Wish I had found this long ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Idea..!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Granted it was over $300.00... but to keep the peace between my two teenagers, it's worth every penny. It completely worked with PS4 as advertised with NO headaches for setup. I also like that it has a hard case already incorporated to protect the console from dust and hard knocks.
customer_reviews.author: ToddB

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I get it being used but the description did not say the case had multiple broken pieces on it, you guys didn’t even bother to clean it or at least wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: christopher riser

customer_reviews.title: Video game case
customer_reviews.text: My Cons of the vanguard black edition is that when I eject the video game CD Disk that CD is Block in because of the Bottom of the case. Then the second cons of the vanguard is the vanguard is too bulky. But the third con of the Vanguard is the screen is not wide enough because when Im trying to watch movies from the movie website I have sit up close to look at the screen also the screen is only 19' Inches!!! But the Pros of the Vanguard is that I like the blue LED Lights on the Left and Right sides my second pros is about the sound Speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Tyree Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: nephew bought this
customer_reviews.text: great gadget. it comes with a tv to be used with your gaming system when you travel but you can also watch movies on it if you have chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely getting your moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: First off the fact that this is a portable way to be able to play games is amazing, the screen quality is amazing, the speakers are really nice great sound quality and volume, case is strong and lightweight. The only thing that makes this a 4 star is I just feel like it's a little bulkier than I expected, it's not a huge downer just something I'd think about
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Medina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deployments
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Was able to use it while I was on deployment
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great quality item. The screen is crystal clear and the sound is excellent. Gaems really put a lot of thought into the construction of these portable games my systems.
customer_reviews.author: VonWhip

customer_reviews.title: Pros - It's a great system to have
customer_reviews.text: Pros - It's a great system to have. The monitor provides a crisp and fluid picture (no dead pixels) with great sound. The box itself does a great job of protecting the console (ps4/Xbox1). Especially while being deployed in the desert, you close it and no sand gets in. Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Cons - I have slight issue with the monitor getting to register with whatever console I have connected sometimes. Just have to keep tapping the input button until it warms ups.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Expecting to deploy (military) or take an extended trip without tv in your room, get this.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me this before I deployed. Wasn't expecting her to buy it before christmas, but she thought I needed it. BEST WIFE EVER!! She was right. I needed it. It made my trip away from home, a little better. I brought my Xbox with me, was able to watch movies and play games during my downtime. It has a big enough screen to actually enjoy it at a safe distance. And when we go on vacation or visit my folks down south, I'll take my Xbox with me with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Blankman4

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No problems
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No problems. I actually play better on it than I do on my TV. Sound is really loud too. I use it constantly now.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best investment we have made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: We only take vacations in the car. Best investment we have made in a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Second review. Product is a fail. The picture will not hold. So far I am not happy with product at all. This will be the end of day 1 waiting dor return call from customer service, one more day, i will return if I can. I gave one star since item arrived early
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy over all
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it is awsome perfect for the gamer on the go just be gentle with it tho it may look like it can serevive a bump but this is an electronic it won't also small storage and no interal battery. You also need 2 plugins and every time you need to pack it up u need to Unplug all the cords and put in storage compartments also no room for games buzz kill I now but this product has great visuals on screen and an awsome sound system for being so small of speakers
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I already love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Two great things: 1. I can smoke my cigars on the patio while playing Xbox. 2. Travel is no longer limited to Steam games on a laptop. Quality is excellent. I was feeling a little buyer's remorse up until receiving it. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: He Who Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt this is an inclusive answer to gaming on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very sorry I bought this item. Now I want another for me PS4!! This Vanguard stuff is the way to go when you're out and about. If your other half is a gamer, well, you'll be smart to buy two!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Davis

customer_reviews.title: Only the coolest mobile gaming rig in the world !!
customer_reviews.text: This mobile gaming rig is amazing!! Everyone I've shown is blown away with how clean this product is. Totally worth the purchase. Easy to set up . I can bring this anywhere and play games , play movies, listen to music. It's also kinda nice to set up when there is a glare in the room . Really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: B-DAWG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband to travel with. So far, he really likes it. It is very lightweight for how much protection it provides. The volume level was also very impressive. It was definitely worth the money considering all of the use hes getting from it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend. Be loved it. He said the resolution was great, there are two separate speakers (one sounds like we’re in the movies theatre) and the best was the fast response when he plays his video games.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Erraez

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the screen was defective, so we exchanged it for another
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamers
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product for a dedicated gamer. The screen has a great resolution, the sound is also incredible for such a "small" device (the sound is much better than my laptop's). I had one single complaint about it but contacted customer service and they got back to me within a day and solved the issue. The only downside for this is that I couldn't use it as a normal TV because the remote that GAEMS uses is specially designed and coudn't be paired.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fragile!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound, the quality, the creativity in making this product each gave this product a star. The durability, and the cost remove the other two. This was a gift for my father, and he took it to work once. His Ambulance hit a pothole, the case fell onto its side, and the screen was destroyed. Can’t see anything. You’d think at this price there would be some kind of buffer for drops or falls.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Farias

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! I had an older fatter xbox 360and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the (9.8 x 7 x 16.7 inches ; 11.5 pounds) GAEMS Vanguard Personal Gaming Environment for PS4, XBOX ONE, PS3, Xbox 360. I LOVE IT! I had an older fatter xbox 360and it was a tight fit, but it fit. It worked great! My son LOVES it. He now has a newer xbox 360 and that works fine with too. So did my PS3. Would buy this again. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pixeechant

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had no other issue other than on the first day I used it one of the latches broke and I had to use a padlock on that side from then on.
customer_reviews.author: KLR3

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $$ on the Vanguard.
customer_reviews.text: Spring the extra cost for the Vanguard. It has a larger screen, High Definition, and GREAT sound. Seriously the sound quality blew me away for the size and complexity of the thing. Easy to travel with and set up. I feel like my Playstation is truly safe in this thing. Much safer than a bookbag or suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: JaneysaurusRex

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today. It was bigger than I thought it would be and I love it. The screen resolution is great, sound is fine, graphics are good, it seems like a pretty sturdy case, and there's plenty of room for everything. I'd highly recommend the product to anyone who is on the go alot. I bought one of those two in one plug ins with it, so it only needs 1 power outlet to plug into. (Power cord for the TV and the system) no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brannon hiser

customer_reviews.title: Low qualaty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting qualaty but the screen has a low refresh rate and it dose not even close without having to push in the sides
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Perfect for the military life. No issues at all, sound and brightness are perfect. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great footprint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the college dorm, or, in our case, barracks. Paired it with a Samsung Dex for more usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: StanC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband thinks this works great After using this for a year I think this is a fantastic system. The case has been across the country with me and has had no issues. I have only used a PS4 with it but everything fits in the case. The only issue I have is that occasionally the hinge pin will try to work out but it is not difficult to put it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: debra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as advertised. Bought used and no description saying it would not have the power cord, hdmi cord, or strap for carrying. Almost returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very durable. My son takes it everywhere and I don't have to worry about his game system being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: kandace

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever created for playing on a playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever created for playing on a playstation 3,4 or any other version. Man I am definitely gonna buy another one if I will be in need of a platform similar to my playstation.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it; finally leaves me alone, & not hog the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: It's nice not having to rely on there being a tv ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot when I go over friends house since most games don't have split screen anymore. It's nice not having to rely on there being a tv available. Brought it on two trips with me no issues with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: At least part of it works.
customer_reviews.text: D ring bent open and attachment clip on the case bent open, the first time I used the shoulder strap. Apparently it can't handle the weight. Now the case is "hand carry only". What a pain at the airport. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Best game console case ever
customer_reviews.text: Since my job was remodeled they put outlets in the lobby for customers to use to charge their phones or laptops so I use the outlets to plug in the screen inside of the carrying case and hook my Xbox One X up to the screen so I'm able to play video games with friends of mine inside my job
customer_reviews.author: Celtics24

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! The Gaems case deserves nothing less than 5 stars. The video quality is amazing, and the built in speakers are LOUD. My original Xbox One fits perfectly and super easy to hook up while traveling. I take it everywhere i travel to. Very good quality and stable! You wont regret buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great picture husband bought one years ago got tired of on trips sharing so bought my own. Great for anyone wanting to game on trips or whenever.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My son is so much excited to have it as he can travel with it during his summer vacations to our homeland. Good volume beautiful look. Do order a battle bag though to handle your game accessories and just to keep it safe though looks strong enough but still it's a screen in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Khurram Lone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! If anyone wants to know how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! If anyone wants to know how to use this in a car, all you need is a 1000 watt inverter and an inverter extension cord. Then you are ready to go. The sound is way better than I expected and the picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works with strings attached
customer_reviews.text: Am impressed but with the xbox 1 you can't put any thing else in the case other wise it voids the warranty. Screen is not the best but will more than to the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my husband and he loves it. Takes it everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Brissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product !! This is coming from a Trucker/Gamer. It's perfect for me I can give my Xbox one some attention and also watch my Firestick on it so I suggest anybody should grab this Product.
customer_reviews.author: BlkPanther

customer_reviews.title: Important is be careful and don't lose it, especially your Personal Gaming Station..
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it and My first personal Gaming Station Well it play thought fine..there no Damage after unboxing it...Now I can go outside without holding in my bookbag..
customer_reviews.author: Luther Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Screen broke after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: The product it awesome, it works great comes with all the cables and what not. My issue I have is with the screen. It broke after about two months. I was very delicate with the product and I’m not sure how this happened. It’s a cool item but the screen broke, so it’s worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Use it for my xbox 1X. Works great. Hooked up an inverter in my car and on long trips I can play xbox now with the gaems case.
customer_reviews.author: BRT

customer_reviews.title: it is big
customer_reviews.text: bigger then I thought, wish it had 2 HDMI inputs and 1 red white yellow, hook ups but I like it
customer_reviews.author: syn shadow

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package it was damaged af look at the quality of this deliverey
customer_reviews.author: Randomguy541

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Only problem I have is with my ps4 the disks are ejected and hits the front lip of the case. Just adjust your gaming system on the given pad and it should eject cleanly. Plus the wife now has the TV, most important;)
customer_reviews.author: Baggins

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Woes
customer_reviews.text: Got it on Friday and took it traveling with me over the weekend. Faired well! I would have given it 5 stars if not for the very annoying HD port acts up constantly it seems
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Justice

customer_reviews.title: This is best money I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: This is best money I have ever spent. not only do I use it for my ps4 but also use for my firestick.
customer_reviews.author: scott haddy

customer_reviews.title: Serves its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good to travel with. It should have came with more space for the acssesories, a tighter clip on the strap because on strap keeps coming updone, and the television should be recognizable by the console so you can play TV APP through it. Hard to open sometimes. It should have came with 2 locks and keys to keep it shut for the price of it. But the item matches the descriptions well. You do have to be up close to play on that small screen though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative For Personal Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: The Vanguard personal gaming bundle is an absolute lifesaver for my current situation. I have no other means of playing my Playstation 4 and this offers me an alternative. The picture comes in at a crisp 1080 and looks fantastic. The only thing that bugs me is the sound. They could have put some better speakers into this unit, but overall its a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Stann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming and on the go
customer_reviews.text: I use it every single day for over 8 hours it runs perfect it’s just like a tv but better. Saves a lot of electricity and u can move where you want to beat choice I’ve ever made. The only downfall is setting it up takes a while but it’s quick
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I took this bad boy on deployment and didn't have a single complaint. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Love it it's just what I needed. Came right on time. It was packaged great so no problems there
customer_reviews.author: Blue m and m

customer_reviews.title: Also
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly 🙌🏾😉 thanks again for the fast shipping was here on time and the day I needed
customer_reviews.author: D Banks

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Investment Ever
customer_reviews.text: For someone who lives about an hour and a half away from most of his friends, this has made taking my consoles over the their place so convenient. The monitor displays better than my TV at home. The shell provides good protection. Needless to say, it definitely eliminates the need to carry a TV with me on the go. Sound is pretty good, also. I'd say throw in your choice of portable speakers for the best experience, specially if the area you'll be in is loud.
customer_reviews.author: E_ROR_404

customer_reviews.title: Good product with just one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didnt like about this product was the hdmi cord. The cord itself didnt allow me to have enough room to plug my power cord to my xbox one in it. Other then that I love the product. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph gapski

customer_reviews.title: It’s fat and big
customer_reviews.text: It was very cool but the down fall was the Size of the case and very heavy after caring it for 5 min but it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: sally bussard

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s prize
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are loud and it doesn’t lag like I thought it would overall a good investment if your traveling a lot or you are on the move a lot( it doesn’t run as a portable you still need to plug it on the wall)
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Xbox One, I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Xbox One, I can travel with it and play anywhere as long as I have power.
customer_reviews.author: LepsLair

customer_reviews.title: The lifesaver of my deployment
customer_reviews.text: The Vanguard Case is everything that was advertised and more. I took it with me at my deployment and it has been such a morale boost. I recommend this case for any gamer and military alike.
customer_reviews.author: David Bastidas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gamer on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This gaming system is great for the Gamer on the go. It's high quality and the 19 inch screen and sound system are perfect. I say this is a good purchase for me. I can take my PlayStation 4 and play it anywhere and if Wi-Fi is available, you can play online. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Da-Funk Boogie

product_meta.title: GAEMS VANGUARD Personal Gaming Environment for Xbox One S, Xbox One, PS4, PS3, Xbox 360 (Consoles Not Included) - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Style:BlackThe Vanguard takes gaming to a whole new level of convenience with a remote control and a PGE Sling for easy carrying. Its rugged armored shell protects your favorite console while in transit, even if that simply means going from room to room. And it's TSA friendly, so make it your carry-on. Looks like layovers just got awesome The GAEMS Vanguard allows you to transform any space into your own Personal Gaming Environment. No matter where you are, all you have to do is pop it open, plug it in and play. Immerse yourself in every detail with the Vanguard's non-reflective 19" 720p (1080p scaled) El-LED display. Unleash the power of its metal-coned chambered speakers, or make your experience a little more personal by utilizing its dual output jacks. The Vanguard takes gaming to a whole new level of convenience with a remote control and a PGE Sling for easy carrying. Its rugged armored shell protects your favorite console while in transit, even if that simply means going from room to room. And it's TSA friendly, so you can throw it in your carry-on. Looks like layovers just got awesome. Comes in a pretty little package: PGE Slinger Remote Accessory Storage Bags Custom Fit EVA Foam Base HDMI Cable Power Supply Mad Respect The Vanguard takes gaming to a whole new level of convenience with a remote control and a PGE Sling for easy carrying. Its rugged armored shell protects your favorite console while in transit, even if that simply means going from room to room. And it's TSA friendly, so make it your carry-on. Looks like layovers just got awesome. platform :b PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, XBOX ONE S
feature_bullets: Storage bags hold your Controllers, power supplies, and other accessories
Removable center badge on the case exterior for future customization
Comes in a pretty Little package: peg Sling, peg remote, accessory storage bags, custom Fit EVA foam base (Xbox One upgrade kit included), HDMI cable, power supply, Mad respect
Shoulder strap, remote, and sticker kit included, Resolution 1366 x 768, display colors (8 bit) 16.7M, Audio integrated stereo speakers
Interior case LED lighting. Product Dimensions 19.75 w x 7 d x 16.75 H inches. Compatibility: Xbox One , Xbox 360 E, Xbox 360 S, Xbox 360 Elite, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 3 Slim
